description.translate: Cry forever in the darkest of nightmares and see your power born in the most primordial of frights.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Reine de la nuit\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Pleure à jamais dans le plus ténébreux des cauchemars\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et vois naître ta puissance en plus primordial des effrois.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Cry forever in the darkest of nightmares and\"}","{\"text\":\"§7see your power born in the most primordial of frights.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§a1 §7HER§a1\"}"]}}
